author: Ted Miller
comment: Would prefer more solid or gradient color backgrounds, the ones supplied can make numbers hard to read, but love the animated numbers and choice of horizontal or vertical
title: Great idea

author: David Tatkin
comment: I have many watch faces for my Moto 360, but this is fast becoming my favorite "go to" dial.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
title: Beautiful Watch Face

author: Guy Johnson
comment: Like the way the time is displayed. Wish there were solid black and White background options. Solid black with red & white numbers. Off-white with red & gray numbers. Nice face.
title: Nice

author: Mike Struthers
comment: Simple yet configurable and the animations look amazing.
title: Looks great!
